name: Farm
uniques: Can also be built on tiles adjacent to fresh water
[+1 Food] on [fresh water] tiles once [Civil Service] is discovered
[+1 Food] on [non-fresh water] tiles once [Fertilizer] is discovered

name: City center
uniques: Ensures a minimum tile yield of [+2 Food, +1 Production]

civilopediaText.text: Marks the center of a city
Appearance changes with the technological era of the owning civilization
